summary: Sharing a small apartment with his sleepy French bulldog, an unmotivated thirty-something slacker lands a job at a Quick Lube, to be close to the shop's beautiful manager. Has he found a new purpose in life? Is there still hope?
cast: Jason Schwartzman|Olympia Dukakis|Tunde Adebimpe|Eleanore Pienta|Stephen Root|Arrow Schwartzman|Jimmy Gonzales|John Gatins|Jonathan Togo|Josh Meyer|Ted Beck|Chris Doubek|Grover Coulson|Alex Karpovsky|Jennifer Prediger|Charlie LaRose|Anna Margaret Hollyman|Michael Tully|Alex Ross Perry|Ben Kweller|Ashley Moore|Bob Byington|Jordan Hargett|Amanda Chapa|Pallavi Chamarthy|Carolee Crawford|Serina Dennis|Catherine Lawrence Kinslow|Ashelena Leveille|Dustin Lewis|George X. Martinez|Rebecca Martinez|Robert T. McDorman|Stefan Melichar|Kristin M. Miller|Nick W. Nicholson|Paul Nye|G-Su Paek|David Payan|Ramon Reyes|Alisha San Marco|Peggy Schott|Rose Sloane|Gary Teague
title: 7 Chinese Brothers
